title: Add Required Event Handler
name: addRequiredEventHandler
description: Adds a listener so necessary information can be retrieved. Such as signature verification, receipts and list of devices.

parameters.name: listener
parameters.notes: An implementation of the Events.Required interface

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the new listener was added successfully

example:
//Register a listener for required events
this.api.addRequiredEventHandler(this);
